root: ^Lanri excitedly contacts you. "I just picked up a message. I'm sure you noticed the ship nearby. It's a food vendor. They're well known for selling delicious but cheap food. I think it would be really neat to pick some up. It would be a cheap way to fill our pantry and feed the crew."

^Her exuberance falters and she hesitates a moment. "I have heard that there are some rumors of food poisoning surrounding their wares." Perking back up, she continues. "However, they are few and far between, with no fatalities attributed to it, so I still recommend them."

Buy: ^Keeping your pantry stocking and your crew hearty and happy is your primary concern. For the quality of the food, it is a great bargain.

^Getting in contact with the other ship, you purchase a good supply of food. You won't have to worry about your crew going hungry, and if there's any shadow of food poisoning now hanging over your ship, it is a faint one.
Decline: ^While the offer is rather tempting, you don't know if you can trust this wandering vendor. The rumors of indigestion may be sparse, but they still exist. While an addition to your food stock would be welcome, you're willing to wait for a more reliable opportunity.
